name: Project Gerada Conquest
description:
This update has improved quite a few things... I managed to decrease screen size to manage the touch screen responses for Phones.
Combat has been smoothed over a bit... attack doesn't work still. Not sure why yet.

Alrighty, fix the Milk bar I think... just a picture draw error... Got the doors fixed... Fixed the goddess statue error... Audio has been brought down on the forge...
